Get the Bull Hat in Beluga Beach.
Get the Daring Hat in Beluga Beach.
Get the Frog Hat in Beluga Beach.
Get the Panda Hat in Beluga Beach.
Get the Rabbit Hat in Beluga Beach.
Ahoy, me friendly cabin boy! This is the number of map pieces you have found so far. Those are big numbers, but don't get bogged down... I will keep track!
Merry Troubled Christmas! This is the number of Sleigh fragments you have found so far. The higher you finish in the Ranking, the more rare your gift will be.
Happy Valentine's Day! This is the number of points you got in roses. To find out how many points is worth every species of roses, you'll have to find out in BoomBang!
These are your Easter Eggs. Look for them in all areas and forests of BoomBang. The more you catch, the better your prize will be. Check your Ranking position on the web.
These are your scored goals. Look for the football balls in BoomBang and shoot them. The champions who score more goals, will get a personalized trophy.
Merry Christmas! This is the number of points you have in the snowflakes contest. Keep on searching them, they are in the areas and forests. Check the web to see your ranking position
Look for the Easter Eggs in all areas. There are Eggs worth different scores. The more you catch, the better your prize will be. Check your Ranking on the web.
Look for the Scrolls in all areas. The more you pick up, the better your prize will be. And only for picking up one, you'll get an object. Check your Ranking on the web.
¡Cabin Boy! Look for the Map Fragments in all areas. The more you pick up, the better your prize will be. And only for picking up one, you'll get an object. Check your Ranking on the web.
Look for the pumpkins falling in all areas. The more you pick up, the better your prize will be. Beware: rotten pumpkins take off points! Check your Ranking on the web.
Look for the letters falling in all areas. The more you pick up, the better your prize will be. And only picking up one you have a free gift! Check your Ranking on the web.
Look for the arrows in all areas. The more you pick up, the better your prize will be. The golden is worth 5 points, and just for picking up 1 you get a gift! Check your Ranking on the web.
Look for the eggs in all areas. The more you pick up, the better your prize will be. There are 10 different types, each with a different score, and just for picking up one you get a free prize.
Get the Ninja in the Ninja way game.
Get the Skeleton in the Underworld area.
Get the Werewolf in the Underworld area.
Get the Zombie in the Underworld area.

A few naughty rabbits have stolen my <font color="#CC2F41">Chocolate Eggs</font> collection and now they are mocking us all over the islands...

But there’s more! Some rabbits are carrying the <font color="#CC2F41">Golden, Silver and Bronze Eggs</font>. If you're fast and lucky enough, you can keep them.

The elves are so busy planning their mischiefs they even forget to eat...

It’s the season to pick up mushrooms! Poisonous mushrooms only grow in the Burrow. It’s a rare species, but Woody will know how to reward you for them.
Bring them to him in exchange for these crazy items for your island.
Look for the other Elf in the Burrow. He will also give you interesting things in exchange for these mushrooms.

Fried, boiled, with vegetables, baked. Yum, yum. I love the <font color="#CC2F41">Lost souls</font>, rather warm and freshly picked.
If you want the Key Fragment Key 1<font color="#CC2F41"> and the Gold</font>, get out of my sight and bring me ten fresh souls you’ll find around.

I need the <font color="#CC2F41">seven Stones</font> falling inside this room to become a fearless Minotaur.
If you bring them to me, I’ll give you the <font color="#CC2F41">Key fragment 4</font> and a valuable Mineral.
Remember: the seven skills of the Hero are Agility, Insight, Speed, Strength, Reflexes, Charisma and Courage. I would go to get them by myself, but...

You think you're pretty smart because you got here?
Here you have the <font color="#CC2F41">Key Fragment 3</font>. When you get the other three pieces, take them to the Blacksmith demon to access the second level.
Besides, if you give him the four minerals the demons give you after completing the quests, you'll get the <font color="#CC2F41">Demonic Chest</font> for free.

Did you think I’d sell these masks to anyone?
If you want either the Zombi or the Werewolf disguises, you’ll have to talk to the demons in the end of the labyrinth of the Eastern great chamber.
Remember, with the Zombie Token, I sell you the Zombie disguise, with the Werewolf Token, the Werewolf mask.
When you have the dress, to complete the transformation, activate the corresponding button on your tab. Activate it again to reverse the transformation.

You got it, human. Not even for all the demons of hell would I have thought that you’d go this far...
Bring this token to the great Demon Druid, and he will give you the power to transform yourself into a Zombie whenever you want.
Remember you can only buy this token once.

I’ll eat up your heart! (…) Uh... I see you do not fear me... u_u
Bring this token to the great Demon Druid, and he will send you the mask to transform yourself into a Werewolf whenever you want.
Recuerda que solo puedes comprar este token una vez.

Get the two parts of the Valentine’s Key in the daily gift box of Flower Power.
Find objects to decorate your new room Valentine set of the Store.
The door to the second level

How dare you coming to the Underworld, human?
If you bring me the four Key fragments, I’ill forge the Infernal Key for you. When you get to the second level, you’ll get the Zombie and Werewolf standards for free, and you’ll be given the chance to buy the power to become a Zombie or a Werewolf.
Also, if you bring me the four minerals the demons in this level give you after completing the four quests, I’ll forge the Demonic Chest for you.

Only a few have reached the end of this damned labyrinth...
Consider yourself a privileged and take the Key fragment 2. When you get the other three, take them to the Demon Blacksmith to get access to the second level.
And if you gather the four minerals that will give you the demons after completing the quests, you'll get the Demonic Chest for free.

Beep... Beep... I don’t know how it happened... I woke up, and suddenly I was like this...
The <font color="#6699FF">tin pieces</font> I’m missing are falling in all BoomBang areas. Bring them to me and I’ll give you some of my toys collection.
Check carefully which pieces I’m asking you for in each case, and if you’re missing some, you can <font color="#6699FF">exchange them</font> with other people.
Also, if you give me gold, I can animate certain toys and turn them into <font color="#6699FF">mobile pets</font> that move wherever you tell them. Beep!

My masterpieces are these <font color="#DDA0DD">marble sculptures</font> you can put together to immortalize a kiss with your beloved Keko.
But lately I’m not myself... I lost inspiration and I can’t sculpt anymore... :-l
Between all the things in the world, love is the only one that could motivate me. Bring me the hearts the <font color="#DDA0DD">Cupid</font> from Beluga Beach will give you and I’ll do my best work for you.

Bring me the half hearts falling in all areas, and I’ll put them together into precious stones you can use to decorate your islands.
But remember! Love is a two-person thing. The pink fragments can only be picked up by <font color="#DDA0DD">girls</font>, and the blue ones, by <font color="#82CFFD">boys</font>. Exchange with them to get the ones you’re missing.
Also, if you bring me the 8 different hearts, I’ll give you a <font color="#DDA0DD">balloon</font> from my collection.
And if you take them to Donatello in <font color="#DDA0DD">Secret Garden</font>, he’ll recover his lost inspiration and will create his amazing sculptures for you.

Somebody forgot this basket here... Which means in The Burrow and other BoomBang areas are appearing <font color="#CC2F41">eggs with different scores</font> .
Pick up as many as you can and <font color="#CC2F41">check out the ranking</font> on the website to find out your position. If you finish in the top positions after the event, you win a rare. Only for picking up a single Egg you’ll get a <font color="#CC2F41">free gift</font>!

Find the necessary objects in the Cemetery.
Do not amuse yourself too much inside this Crypt... The Ghoul is just starting to get a bit hungry... ;)

I be Abominable and Horrible Monster. Roooooarrrrr!
But in Spare Time, Make Snow Sculptures. :-D

Hi, explorer! I came to BoomBang in search of the famous Cards of the Egyptian Oracle that are now falling in all areas.
Bring them to me, and I’ll give you beautiful treasures as Egyptian busts of the Kekos and other relics.
EXCHANGE the cards you don’t have with other Kekos!
Bring the Gold Doubloon now falling in all areas and I’ll give you these navigation devices and other objects that will help you becoming a real pirate.

It’s the season to pick up mushrooms! Poisonous mushrooms only grow in the Burrow. It’s a rare species, but Elph will know how to reward you for them.
Bring them to him in exchange for these crazy items for your island.
Look for the other Elf in the Burrow. He will also give you interesting things in exchange for these mushrooms.

Collect the tokens falling in all areas, because in exchange of every 10 of them, you’ll get a statue of any of the dragon species inhabiting BoomBang.
Besides, if you bring me the 10 different statues, I’ll will give you the Great Statue, where the spirit of the dragons have been immortalized.
Exchange with other Kekos the tokens you are missing!

Some terrifying event left the Kekos in this strange state.
Get this macabre Halloween memory in exchange of gold and some of the bloods falling right now in the Cemetery.

Are you sure you're ready to become a supernatural creature?
Bring this token to the great Mask Trader, and he will sell you the mask to transform yourself into a <font color="#CC2F41">Skeleton</font> whenever you want.
Remember that this token is not interchangeable, and you can only buy it once.

This year everything is going so well! Or so it seems... You think this is easy? Do something for me. The stars now falling in all areas let my sleigh fly through the skies so smoothly!.
Help me gathering as many stars as possible and I’ll give you these Christmas objects in exchange.

I just brought this exotic collection of hats from distant lands. It's your big chance to go to the latest fashion!
You can put on and take off the hats anytime you want from your character card. You can also wear them together with costumes. Hats remain in your Keko forever.
I assure you these models are all the rage!

Awww... Can’t you smell it? That sweet fragrance of love... It smells like lemon, roses, jasmine, mint...
What would I give to have them! If you find any fragrance, bring it to me. I promise to reward you.
What about you? Are you in love?

My children have escaped and now they are invading BoomBang islands! If you rescue them and bring them to me you can win original rare objects.
You only have to: 1. Pick up the chocolate falling in all areas and bring them to me in exchange for Rabbit traps. 2. Put the traps on your island and wait.
And if you are lucky you can catch other rare species.

Siihggg... (deep sigh) How I miss floating, breaking the speed of light, traveling in the infinite peace of space... I arrived in one piece, and I'll be in orbit soon, but... the other meteorites are shattered??... Can you help me to mend them? If you bring me the necessary fragments, we´ll be able to reconstruct my interplanetary friends, so they can levitate again... In your own island!

In exchange, it will offer you new types of Silver bags (with 50 and 10 coins) you can’t get anywhere else.

These potions cause incredible effects on people.
You can consume them or throw them to other people.
You can only have one of them active at a time, and its effects last for a few minutes.
Some potions can only be used by VIP Kekos.
The ingredients I’m asking you for can be found at the Cemetery, and the rest you can ask for the zombies in the nearby.

Go to Beluga Beach Area to chat and meet people!
Go to an area, select a nice user (clic on his feet) and look for the 'make friend' icon into his Card to send him a friendship request!

If you see a Gift jumping clic on it to open it. If you come back tomorrow we'll give you more!
To exchange an item with other user you have to be with that user in the same Area or island. Clic on this icon to complete an exchange of items.
You can meet people and make friends going to any area.

BOOH! :O Phew... You scared me! What is hidden in the crypt? Are they there Light and Tim? It brings together the digits that are the key to open the door, and we'll find out together. If you don't know what I'm talking about, look for Mr. Spectrum.

If you don't have the 14 digits yet, hurry and ask the other spectra of BoomBang, and try to ask your friends for tips. What may be inside the Crypt? Between you and me: Brrrrrr! I'm scaaaaaaaaared!

What is it inside the Third Crypt?
Did you gathered the 14 digits? The moment of truth is coming... Enter here your code so I can test if your combination opens the door for the Crypt.
What is it inside the Third Crypt?

If I were you and I was still alive... I would stay as far away as possible. But if you already became infected... Wouldn't it be fun to help your species to spread as much as possible to own the territory? Pick up the potions falling from the sky in all areas and throw them over other kekos to infect them. But be careful: you can only pick up the potions designed to transform people into your own species.
So... Welcome to the Dark Side, oh small creature from hell. The war began!
PS: I heard that a plague of ugly squirming creatures escaped from the crypt. If you entered the correct code, check out your backpack.

Oops! Perhaps we shouldn't have opened the Crypt. We managed to free Tim and Luz, but... it seems they are not the nice moderators we met anymore... Tim is particularly angry, and the poor Luz is in an advanced state of decomposition...
What is it inside the Third Crypt?
Nobody pays attention to this old fool anymore...
Is BoomBang coming to its ending?

A rasta ancestor of us predicted that in November 11th 2011, at 11:11:11 a.m. something big would arrive to BoomBang.The problem is, from there and on, the inscriptions are blurred... What could have he mean with that prediction? Will rares drop in price? Will BoomBang moderators finally start to work? Or... Was he actually talking about the end of BoomBang?
Nobody pays attention to this old fool anymore... But it took more than two hundred years of researching to finally make this revealing discovery...
Did you see the meteorite in Beluga?

Huh? Hey young man, what are you looking at? Set aside. Stop that! Ahem. You discovered me... I knew what would happen because I had read it in the horoscope of the Sunday paper... Sorry, I can help it, I just love thinking about the future. By the way, which is you zodiac sign?

I told you! I was the first to predict that in November 11th something great would come to BoomBang. Those decades of hard work of research and divination finally paid off. I am an incomparable prophet, the best...
Can you help me recomposing my friends?
Uncle Santa is going into retirement...
Don't worry, I'm a crack driver.

Emm... I just wanted to let you know that I have everything under control, and... uh... you don't have to worry, nothing can go wrong. I've never driven a sled, but... I think I will be fine. Well, at least I think so.

Uh... Hello? I'm Chris Claus. Well, at least I think so. Err... Can help you? Oh, yes! This year my uncle Santa is retiring, and... and I think I'll take care of the presents and... and all this Christmas stuff... you know.
It's a hard life... (in the language of reindeers)
I need a vacation... (in the language of reindeers)
Come back, Santa! (in the language of reindeers)
That Chris Claus can't ride a sleigh.

Hey, what are you looking at? Stay away of my sled. No, I'm not willing to use those long-range guns, they are just for decoration. By the way, what do you know about the Christmas fanart contest? What a nice texture have crayons, how fun using colours and making up new designs... Uh? Ahem! No, no, it´s not that I want to participate, it's just a friend of mine asked me...

Hey, what are you doing there? You are blocking my view! What? What do I think about Chris Claus replacing Santa this year? Well, don't think I care about it, not that I envy that skinny who can't even wrap a gift.
That Chris Claus can't ride a sleigh.

If we leave the Christmas presents in their hands, is certain that this year we won't have our gifts! Why don't you help me finding the reindeer Catelyn so I can fix everything?
My Goblin helpers managed to steal the code to track Santa's helpers, but they are a bit naughty and now they wont tell me... Why don't you try to talk with them? If you bring me the right combination, I'll give you an object to decorate your island.
What an unfortunate accident... What might have collided with his sleigh in midair? In short, that skinny of Chris Claus has no idea of driving. Do you still trust him?
Oh, oh... I hope Santa is not looking.

Catelyn, can you help me up? Catelyn? Oh, no. I think it escaped after the collision... What will I do without my reindeer? Oh, wait, do not panic. My uncle gave me a transmitter to locate it. And a security code to activate it as well. And the code is... How was it? Emm... is not that I can't remember it, but just to be sure...
Can you help me finding Santa's helpers? They also know the code, and I'm sure he will tell you without hesitation. Or so I hope... Do you like Christmas ornaments? If you can assemble the right combination, you will not regret it, I'll give you a very special one.
In search of the lost reindeer

Huh? Who? Where? Something came directly to me while I was flying... My sled has been pureed! Help me to collect as many pieces as possible before Christmas, and I will get a rare object for you. You can check your possition in the ranking visiting our website. I hope my uncle don't find out...

After an emotional conversation that lasted until dawn, the Baron asked Chris to help him delivering the presents, and he broke down in tears of gratitude and buried the hatchet.
After the tumultuous events of recent weeks, I finally returned to my steady life of reindeer, and gifts have been delivered. So if this holiday you helped us return everything to normal, look in your backpack, pleasant surprises are waiting you.

<font color="#FF6600">Catelyn</font> (in the language of reindeers): I finally found out the reason why the Baron beared Chris grudge: they are cousins, and Santa Claus is so absentminded he didn't consider the Baron when he chose his apprentice.
Oh, no... I think I'm in love!
Help me picking up the roses.

What can I do to seduce her? I'd like to give her a whole garden of flowers! <font color="#FF6600">Help me picking up the roses falling right now in all areas</font>, and if you collect more points than anyone in the Ranking, you'll get a very special gift. But beware! You may think all flowers are the same, but they are not. The truth is that I do not understand much about the subject... you'll have to ask a specialist...
Sigh... I feel butterflies flying in my stomach, I'm always distracted, and I have lost my appetite. What is happening to me...? Oh, no... I think I'm in love!

To move to the second level, bring the Demon Blacksmith the four <font color="#CC2F41">Key Fragments</font> it needs to build the <font color="#CC2F41">Infernal Key</font>.
You’ll get each Key Fragment after completing four missions. At the end of each mission you’ll also receive a valuable <font color="#CC2F41">Mineral</font>. If you gather the four minerals and carry them to the Blacksmith demon, you'll get a <font color="#CC2F41">strange relic</font>.
Let yourself be led by the signs and maps, and pay close attention if you don’t want your soul to wander alone for eternity...

Are you sure you want to come in?
You have a long road ahead to achieve the evil power of changing into a <font color="#CC2F41">Zombie</font> or <font color="#CC2F41">Werewolf</font> whenever you want to.

Watch your step, because if you activate the wrong stone, you’ll come back to the beginning. Want to know the correct sequence of symbols? They say you can find it<font color="#CC2F41"> in an inscription engrabed somewhere in Hell</font>...
Stay calm and don’t be mislead by this evil maze. If you reach the end, you’ll find the <font color="#CC2F41">Key fragment 2</font> and a gift.
Are you sure you want to come in? Many got into the Damned Labyrinth, but only a few went out...
Overcome the path to get to the Lava demon. It will give you the <font color="#CC2F41">Key Fragment 3</font> and a precious mineral that can only be found in hell.
You better have good reflexes and temperance if you don’t want to end up throwing bubbles.
Already have the 2 parts to get the full key?
Get the key to open Valentine's room in your house!

Bring me the tokens falling right now in all areas.
Follow my steps and you’ll become a dragon hunter.
Check out the new dragon species in the Shop.
Check out the new Skeleton Keko.
Some inexplicable events occur on Halloween...

Step on the teleporters to move between the islets to find the right way to get through the maze, where the <font color="#CC2F41">Skeleton King</font> is waiting you with a new Halloween <font color="#CC2F41">disguise</font>.
Pick up the bones falling inside the islets, because the Skeleton King will ask you for them.
Do you have the three Halloween disguises?
Bring me the stars falling in all areas.
These objects are new and they won’t be for sale again.
Ho Ho Ho, Merry Christmas! (Did I say it right?)
You can also wear them together with the disguises.
He loves me, he loves me not…
It’s so sweet and it smells so nice...
Bring me the hearts falling in all areas.

"The digit number <font color="#FF6600">2</font> of the key that opens my chest is the in day which BoomBang made the first publication into its new Facebook page."

Long have been my adventures thought the Seven Seas of BoomBang. In many decades, there is only one thing I haven't achieved: a Great Chest I can't open. If you help me to find the password that opens it, I will share my treasure with you .
Every day a pirate will appear in BoomBang and he will give you two new hints to get two new digits that form the key. Be sure to complete carefully the tasks and write the digits down, because the last day you will only have one chance to send the correct password.
Notice to mariners: Don't use clones! Screts: - Me friend Luz will give you some hints. - Don't you feel like taking a walk around the Swamp?
In search of the Chest Key

Send a screenshot of your garden (in your house or island) to luz@boombang.tv until 8th October.
The best gardens in BoomBang will get a <font color="#FF0000">unique trophy</font>and will appear in a new section with highlighted islands in FP. You’ll have a new chance each week!

Do you like these <font color="#FF0000">roses</font>? Now you can have them on your own island. Look for them in the Plants set of the Shop.
You'll also find some new species of flowers of different colors. Plant them on your house or island to let them grow healthy... You can get a rare!
And if you want to have a more welcoming garden... you’ll find some new charming objects in the Decorative set.

Tomorrow we shall unveil the mistery

Fulfilling the Pirate Missions has been an authentic act of bravery on your part, and if you followed the instructions correctly, you'll have your deserved reward. Now I'll try to open the Great Chest with the combination you gave me, and if it works, tomorrow we'll discover together what's hidden inside. By the Powers! Why is this chest moving so much?
Harr! Along the decades I have visited the most inhospitable lands, and I have confronted the most fearsome buccaneers. But I have never met so fearless Cabin boys such as BoomBang's.
In search of the Chest Key
Say hello to the Treasure Monsterr!
Somethin' unique in the Seven Seas

But Ada, its last female specimen, just wanted a hidden place for her centenary hibernation... and for incubate her breeding. If the combination you sent me was the correct one, Ada will give you one of them for adoption, and so you will help preserving her species forever. Take good care of it. It may look a bit sharp, but its the most noble criature never found in the Seven Seas. Ahoy!
Yo-ho-ho! The most experimented masters in Strange Marine Biology thought the Treasures Devourer had already become extinct.
In search of the Chest key
Lets trade! You need some chocolate coins.
I've created my first Easter egg!

Look for the other spectra in the darkest areas of BoomBang and they will tell you the clues to gather the password that unlocks the door. Or... are you too afraid to unleash what it's captive there?
Hint: Search for the first spectrum in the Cemetery. Hint 2: A ghost has stolen Luz Twitter's account (<font color="#FF6600">@boombang</font>), he will give you clues to complete the missions. Caution: If you use clones, I will possess you! Be careful, you will only have a chance to send your digits combination.

Horror! Horror! I'm Mr. Spectrum. I'm stuck in the Eighth Dimension for ever and ever. Can you hear it? <font color="#FF6600">That growls from the depths of the Crypt of the Cemetery won't let me rest in peace.</font>
What is it inside the Third Crypt?

Mr. Spectrum says <font color="#FF6600">the first digit</font> is the answer to the question: Which is the typical food eaten in England for Halloween? 1. Fish & Chips 2. Bread with butter 3. Fried Pumpkin 4. Candy Apples 5. Caramelized Pear
... and the <font color="#FF6600">digit number 2</font> is on the top level of an island with the name of the skeleton that starred Nightmare Before Christmas (separate each word with an underscore).

BOOH! I'm scareeeed. What is hidden inside the Crypt? Are there Luz and Tim still there? Bring together the digits that form the key to open the door, and we'll find out together. If you don't know what I'm talking about, look for Mr. Spectrum.
What is it inside the Third Crypt?
Mr. Spectrum says the <font color="#FF6600">digits number 3 and 4</font> are the number of Shawody Flowers decoring Luz islands.

BOOH! Trick or treat? What is hidden inside the Crypt? Are there Luz and Tim still there? Bring together the digits that form the key to open the door, and we'll find out together. If you don't know what I'm talking about, look for Mr. Spectrum.
What is it inside the Third Crypt?

Mr. Spectrum says the <font color="#FF6600">digit number 5</font> is the number of pumpkins hidden (very well hidden) in the Graveyard.
... and the <font color="#FF6600">digit number 6</font> is on the top level of a Haunted_House.

BOOH! I see ... I see ... I see the light! What is hidden inside the Crypt? Are there Luz and Tim still there? Bring together the digits that form the key to open the door, and we'll find out together. If you don't know what I'm talking about, look for Mr. Spectrum.
What is it inside the Third Crypt?
Mr. Spectrum says the <font color="#FF6600">digits number 7 and 8</font> are the number of gravestones of the Cemetery.

BOOH! Do zombies eat French fries with their fingers? Are there Luz and Tim still there? Bring together the digits that form the key to open the door, and we'll find out together. If you don't know what I'm talking about, look for Mr. Spectrum.
What is it inside the Third Crypt?

Mr. Spectrum says the <font color="#FF6600">digit number 9</font> will tell you a parrot ghost hidden in one of the islands of Luz.
... and the <font color="#FF6600">digit number 10</font> is the answer to the question: When originated the famous Trick or Treat all children repeat for Halloween? 1. XXVth century 2. Middle Ages 3. Prehistory 4. Last week 5. XVIIth century

BOOH! I'm going on vacation to Mali-Boo. What is hidden in the crypt? Are they there Light and Tim? It brings together the digits that are the key to open the door, and we'll find out together. If you don't know what I'm talking about, look for Mr. Spectrum.
